content: Follow the main path across the bridge from the Shrine and down to a stream, and follow it into a large bamboo forest patrolled by snakes. On the opposite side of the circular forest, you can spot two small statues forming an entrance into the grove where Guagnmou lurks.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Guangmou.md', within the main section titled 'Guangmou', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Guangmou'.
The content is as follows:
Follow the main path across the bridge from the Shrine and down to a stream, and follow it into a large bamboo forest patrolled by snakes. On the opposite side of the circular forest, you can spot two small statues forming an entrance into the grove where Guagnmou lurks.
